questions.quote: ...uh, Jerry, I think he broke my toe.  W-Where're you going?
Yeah, is he still mad at you for crashing his Thanksgiving party?
Well, obviously, we all know each other very well,  I'm sure that we'll all feel comfortable within the confines of the honor system.
Oh. Okay. So he'll just think that the two of you didn't sit with him on purpose. Ooh yeah, that's very nice. Very nice.
All right, let's go. We don't have much time before the meeting.
Nevermind. Disgraceful. Leaves you sitting there on the kitchen floor like some kind of roach trap. Wham, bam, thank you ma'am. Sir, whatever. She's not going to get away with this.
George...but if I ask him now, I will have no chance of going out with him.
Uh, actually my parents are over, but, would you like to meet them?
More Pledge! I just bought two cans last week and I don't even have any wood in the house!
Jerry, karate is not here . It's here , and here , and here .
